name: rows
description: Array of table rows and cells.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text for cells in table rows. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML for cells in table rows. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: header
params.description: Header text for cells in responsive table rows only.

params.name: format
params.description: Specify format of a cell. Currently we only use `"numeric"`.

params.name: colspan
params.description: Specify how many columns a cell extends.

params.name: rowspan
params.description: Specify how many rows a cell extends.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text for table head cells. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML for table head cells. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: format
params.description: Specify format of a cell. Currently we only use `"numeric"`.

params.name: colspan
params.description: Specify how many columns a cell extends.

params.name: rowspan
params.description: Specify how many rows a cell extends.

name: heading
description: Heading/label of the panel if the panel argument is set to true.

name: headingLevel
description: Optional heading level for the heading. Defaults to `3`.

name: captionClasses
description: Classes for caption text size. Classes to add to the table caption, for example `"nhsuk-table__caption--l"`.

name: firstCellIsHeader
description: If set to true, first cell in table row will be a TH instead of a TD.

name: responsive
description: If set to true, responsive table classes will be applied.

name: tableClasses
description: Classes to add to the table container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the table container.
